name: Orange Salmon with Rice
author: L. Britten
directions: Bring the rice and water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the rice is tender, and the liquid has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes
Meanwhile, season salmon fillets with salt and pepper
Spray a large skillet with cooking spray and heat over medium-high heat
Place salmon fillets into the skillet and cook until golden, about 3 minutes on each side
Cover and reduce heat to medium and continue cooking until the salmon flakes easily with a fork, 2 to 3 minutes longer
Remove salmon from the skillet and set aside
Stir orange juice and soy sauce into the same skillet
Cook on high heat until slightly thickened, 1 to 2 minutes
Remove from heat and stir in the sesame oil
Spoon sauce over the salmon and serve with rice
